headline: 3 Reasons to Sell CRL and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Charles River Laboratories’s stock price has taken a beating over the past six months, shedding 20.8% of its value and falling to $145.05 per share. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
